subject: tyn ((Dr)L)(4)
body:
I'm thankful for what I built.

I'm thankful for everyone else's excitement when I couldn't feel much at all.

I'm thankful for gifted prosecco and fancy crisps.

I'm thankful for my twitter mentions blowing up.

I'm thankful for my friend's tight hug as she left the bar.

I'm thankful for unexpectedly voluminous praise.

I'm thankful I passed my viva.

\- (Dr)L (6/17/16).

previously: [1](http://tinyletter.com/thankyounotes/letters/thank-you-notes-l-1), [2](http://tinyletter.com/thankyounotes/letters/thank-you-notes-l-2), [3](http://tinyletter.com/thankyounotes/letters/thank-you-notes-l-3)
